author: tom_acemoglu
post: I can assure you that colinsberry has it right. I’m referring to Positivism and Fundamentalism as fairly standard terminology in studying the philosophy of religion. As far as “finest icons” I would include anything from the the various Pantocrators (I’m partial to the image from St Catherine’s on Mt Sinai), Andrei Rublev’s Trinity, Our Lady of Perpetual Help, etc. It was a total trip to find this comment re posted here. Thanks!.
title: At least as potent as the finest icons
